verses.text: Now \add these are\add* the divisions of the sons of Aaron. The sons of Aaron ; Nadab , and Abihu , Eleazar , and Ithamar.
But Nadab and Abihu died before their father , and had no children : therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest’s office.
And David distributed them, both Zadok of the sons of Eleazar , and Ahimelech of the sons of Ithamar , according to their offices in their service.

And there were more chief men found of the sons of Eleazar than of the sons of Ithamar ; and \add thus\add* were they divided. Among the sons of Eleazar \add there were\add* sixteen chief men of the house of \add their\add* fathers , and eight among the sons of Ithamar according to the house of their fathers.
Thus were they divided by lot , one sort with another ; for the governors of the sanctuary , and governors \add of the house\add* of God , were of the sons of Eleazar , and of the sons of Ithamar.

And Shemaiah the son of Nethaneel the scribe , \add one\add* of the Levites , wrote them before the king , and the princes , and Zadok the priest , and Ahimelech the son of Abiathar , and \add before\add* the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites : one principal household being taken for Eleazar , and \add one\add* taken for Ithamar.\f + \fr 24.6 \ft principal…: Heb. house of the father\f*
Now the first lot came forth to Jehoiarib , the second to Jedaiah ,
The third to Harim , the fourth to Seorim ,
The fifth to Malchijah , the sixth to Mijamin ,
The seventh to Hakkoz , the eighth to Abijah ,
The ninth to Jeshua , the tenth to Shecaniah ,
The eleventh to Eliashib , the twelfth to Jakim ,
The thirteenth to Huppah , the fourteenth to Jeshebeab ,
The fifteenth to Bilgah , the sixteenth to Immer ,
The seventeenth to Hezir , the eighteenth to Aphses ,
The nineteenth to Pethahiah , the twentieth to Jehezekel ,
The one and twentieth to Jachin , the two and twentieth to Gamul ,
The three and twentieth to Delaiah , the four and twentieth to Maaziah.

These \add were\add* the orderings of them in their service to come into the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, according to their manner , under Aaron their father , as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God of Israel had commanded him. \p
¶ And the rest of the sons of Levi \add were these:\add* Of the sons of Amram ; Shubael : of the sons of Shubael ; Jehdeiah.\f + \fr 24.20 \ft Shubael: also called, Shebuel\f*
Concerning Rehabiah : of the sons of Rehabiah , the first \add was\add* Isshiah.
Of the Izharites ; Shelomoth : of the sons of Shelomoth ; Jahath.\f + \fr 24.22 \ft Shelomoth: also called, Shelomith\f*
And the sons \add of Hebron;\add* Jeriah \add the first\add*, Amariah the second , Jahaziel the third , Jekameam the fourth.
\add Of\add* the sons of Uzziel ; Michah : of the sons of Michah ; Shamir.
The brother of Michah \add was\add* Isshiah : of the sons of Isshiah ; Zechariah.
The sons of Merari \add were\add* Mahli and Mushi : the sons of Jaaziah ; Beno. \p
¶ The sons of Merari by Jaaziah ; Beno , and Shoham , and Zaccur , and Ibri.
Of Mahli \add came\add* Eleazar , who had no sons.
Concerning Kish : the son of Kish \add was\add* Jerahmeel.
The sons also of Mushi ; Mahli , and Eder , and Jerimoth. These \add were\add* the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.

These likewise cast lots over against their brethren the sons of Aaron in the presence of David the king , and Zadok , and Ahimelech , and the chief of the fathers of the priests and Levites , even the principal fathers over against their younger brethren.
